title: Fort Worth Officer Resigns After Fatal Shooting of Black Woman
text:
A Fort Worth, Texas, police officer who fatally shot an African-American woman in her own home resigned Monday, the same day her family called for the officer to be arrested and prosecuted.

Police officials said Officer Aaron Dean was conducting a wellness check at the home where 28-year-old Atatiana Jefferson was living early Saturday, after a neighbor reported an open front door and the lights on in the middle of the night. Moments later, he shot Ms. Jefferson dead through the window without identifying himself, body camera...
description: A Fort Worth police officer who fatally shot an African-American woman in her own home resigned, the same day her family called for the officer to be arrested and prosecuted.
